title: AB de Royse777
author: AB de Royse777
content: ..The announcement is designed and managed by BitUbet management. I am only responsible to post the thread...

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Royse777 can you answer our questions or someone from BitUbet team will do it?I visited website and I saw that design is almost identical with Rollbit casino, so s there any connection between this casinos or not?This is best seen after opening sports page on both websites.

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.created_time: November 07, 2023, 10:26:33 PMLast edit: November 07, 2023, 11:01:20 PM by famososMuertos
comments.body: Hi, OP - BitUbet WToBTTThe bonus has its corresponding section and the main thing is there, 35x, what games allow you to wager, blah, blah, but I can't find the time limit to complete it, at least not in "Bonus Terms and Conditions." Then, there is no live support ,so I'm asking here... that's it for now. Edit:to whom it May concern.SupportHello and welcome to our Live Chat! My name is Tom and I will assist you today.Q1:VPN?We do not specifically restrict the use of VPN if you wish to protect your privacy but you should not use VPN with the intent to circumvent geo-blocking or jurisdiction restrictions.Q2:time?14 days to complete the wagering requirement of the 200% bonus.You have 7 days to complete the wagering requirement of the Free Spins Bonus.These details do not appear in .bitubet.com/en/bonus-terms, they are in general conditions:It is written at the bottom of the page when you click on Terms and Conditions./

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: welcome to the forum, maybe I'm wrong, but it seems to me that the casino has already been operating for a few months, I say this because the TOS was changed a few months ago, which means that the casino has already been operating for a few months. But it's strange that there aren't many comments from people on the internet talking about this casino. I searched on trustpiloto and casino.guro, I only saw one comment on casino.guro, although it is a positive comment, still only having just one comment, shows that people don't have much interest in this casino, maybe that's why they They decided to create an ann thread on the forum.but it seems to me that they have no intention of creating a signature campaign, knowing that there are options to have a copper account to allow newbies to post photos, it is strange that they have not chosen to create an account, buy a copper account and post in the ann thread . Well, I'll wait for someone representing the casino to come so I can post the questions I have. I wish the casino much success. congratulations to OP for the ANN Thread designer

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Slow death on November 07, 2023, 10:41:06 PM~Snip~The casino is at least 245 days old one because if you see the whois data of the site then it was registered 245 days ago and that's an indicator that this casino has been online for more than 200 days at least. The announcement thread as we all know was posted by Royse and I believe that Royse is going to be the campaign manager to manage the signature campaign of the BitUbEt.I warmly welcome BitUbEt on our forum and I hope that soon they will launch their signature campaign in order to get exposure on this forum. Their site seems good to me and with some promotion they will get some good players on their platform.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on November 07, 2023, 09:51:04 PMI visited website and I saw that design is almost identical with Rollbit casino, so s there any connection between this casinos or not?Perhaps the only identical similarity with Rollbit is in terms of its Sportsbook, while the other displays are slightly different.I want to ask, will there be a forum representative later who will answer problems or other related questions here?It would be great if there was a direct representation from the casino.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Quote from: SamReomo on November 07, 2023, 10:55:29 PMThe casino is at least 245 days old one because if you see the whois data of the site then it was registered 245 days ago and that's an indicator that this casino has been online for more than 200 days at least. The announcement thread as we all know was posted by Royse and I believe that Royse is going to be the campaign manager to manage the signature campaign of the BitUbEt.The fact that the domain name was registered a long time ago does not mean that the service has been available since that date. Searching online, there is not much about this platform, and it seems that throughout the past 200 days (since the date of domain registration) they have been working on further development. There is no clarification anywhere about the actual launch date, since the platform did not launch an official announcement on any of the channels, until today’s date of publishing the announcement here on the forum.Quote from: SamReomo on November 07, 2023, 10:55:29 PMI warmly welcome BitUbEt on our forum and I hope that soon they will launch their signature campaign in order to get exposure on this forum. Their site seems good to me and with some promotion they will get some good players on their platform.Also, Royse publishing the official announcement does not mean that he will run a signature campaign. No one knows about the platform’s promotional plans, especially with the absence of an official representative who can answer these questions. The announcement was not designed by Royse, and he indicated that he was only asked to publish it. Overall, I think it's good that they chose Royse to help promote here on the forum. I think this is the best thing any platform can do, especially in the beginning stage.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: coupable on November 07, 2023, 11:21:53 PMQuote from: SamReomo on November 07, 2023, 10:55:29 PMI warmly welcome BitUbEt on our forum and I hope that soon they will launch their signature campaign in order to get exposure on this forum. Their site seems good to me and with some promotion they will get some good players on their platform.Also, Royse publishing the official announcement does not mean that he will run a signature campaign. No one knows about the platform’s promotional plans, especially with the absence of an official representative who can answer these questions. The announcement was not designed by Royse, and he indicated that he was only asked to publish it. Overall, I think it's good that they chose Royse to help promote here on the forum. I think this is the best thing any platform can do, especially in the beginning stage.Well, i won't agree that this platform BitUbet will not run a signature campaign. I think since Royse777 is in contact with them and helped to publish the ANN on their behalf, i think he will be able convince them the benefits of running a long term signature campaign and most probably if they do, they will give Royse777 this responsibility.To be honest, the new gambling sites need not only need to be good within themselves, but they need to market themselves so that gamblers get to know about them and play at those sites. Signature Campaigns at this forum are the best medium to promote the sites provided Bitubet has sufficient budget for this purpose.

Signature Campaigns at this forum are the best medium to promote the sites provided Bitubet has sufficient budget for this purpose.Totally understandable basing up on the current arrangement that we are seeing that if Royse did get the job on posting their ANN thread in behalf then it would be most likely that ads or marketing would really comes next. So it is really that safe to presume out that signature campaign would comes next and of course he would be the ones who would really be handling it out. It would really be that understandableor likely to happen.Recently, new gambling platforms are really that making up some launch and they are quite good looking. This one is really that been dealt up by one of the knownmanagers of this forum then i do already expect that this one would really be making up some noise.Its not really that bad looking either.

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on November 07, 2023, 09:51:04 PMRoyse777 can you answer our questions or someone from BitUbet team will do it?I visited website and I saw that design is almost identical with Rollbit casino, so s there any connection between this casinos or not?This is best seen after opening sports page on both websites.I don't know but maybe it's just me, but I don't see any similarity on my end?Quote from: SamReomo on November 07, 2023, 10:55:29 PMThe casino is at least 245 days old one because if you see the whois data of the site then it was registered 245 days ago and that's an indicator that this casino has been online for more than 200 days at least. The announcement thread as we all know was posted by Royse and I believe that Royse is going to be the campaign manager to manage the signature campaign of the BitUbEt.I warmly welcome BitUbEt on our forum and I hope that soon they will launch their signature campaign in order to get exposure on this forum. Their site seems good to me and with some promotion they will get some good players on their platform.Well it's good if we are going to see another signature campaign from a crypto based online casinos. And it's just proper that it will be in this great community. Yes, there are a lot of competition out there and for sure BitUbet.com knows it.But we will have to wait and see if Royse if going to handle it, as he put a disclaimer that this ANN thread is manage by the team themselves, and Royse responsibility is to post this thread. Although they could have been advised to buy a copper membership and they can post it themselves.In any case, welcome to the community and hopefully you will stay here. Best of luck to your new casino.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Quote from: virasog on November 09, 2023, 07:12:40 PMWell, i won't agree that this platform BitUbet will not run a signature campaign. I think since Royse777 is in contact with them and helped to publish the ANN on their behalf, i think he will be able convince them the benefits of running a long term signature campaign and most probably if they do, they will give Royse777 this responsibility.This is too early to expect. And perhaps there is no need for it at all.All I can say is that BitUbet team is capable of launching a promotional campaign with a high success rate. Their choice of Royce's services could demonstrate their interest in building a good reputation in the gambling industry and consequently in the crypto market as a whole. Any cryptobased gambling site will receive satisfactory results if it launches a promotional campaign on Bitcointalk. With good management, there is no doubt about that.

comments.author: babygun
comments.body: Welcome to the forum! Just browsed around the site and the site looks nice. But I didn’t really see something that really stands out also yet. Would love to hear some experiences for people who played on the casino and what they found about it.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Quote from: coupable on November 09, 2023, 09:56:30 PMQuote from: virasog on November 09, 2023, 07:12:40 PMWell, i won't agree that this platform BitUbet will not run a signature campaign. I think since Royse777 is in contact with them and helped to publish the ANN on their behalf, i think he will be able convince them the benefits of running a long term signature campaign and most probably if they do, they will give Royse777 this responsibility.This is too early to expect. And perhaps there is no need for it at all.All I can say is that BitUbet team is capable of launching a promotional campaign with a high success rate. Their choice of Royce's services could demonstrate their interest in building a good reputation in the gambling industry and consequently in the crypto market as a whole. Any cryptobased gambling site will receive satisfactory results if it launches a promotional campaign on Bitcointalk. With good management, there is no doubt about that.Yes, we've seen a lot of new casinos this year going on that route, a signature campaign, regardless of who is going to handle it. But most likely if BitUbet wanted to run a campaign, they already have their choice already, and with that just a matter of time before they drop it here.So first off, welcome to the community. We get excited to see a new casinos here, because as gamblers, we wanted to have more options to play or at least there's a alternative. Because as gamblers, most of the time we wanted to try new specially if you have been playing on your favorite casinos and you have a string of bad luck. So better try another one.Second, this is a very competitive niche and so each and everyone would want to promote it and we gamblers are going to benefit if lets say first deposit bonus, or there will be competitions, etc. So it's good to have them and even it's a very competitive niche, it's not that saturated as there are a lot of gamblers around the world.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: Kemarit on November 09, 2023, 09:33:50 PMI don't know but maybe it's just me, but I don't see any similarity on my end?Than maybe you are blind, and I dont know what you added question mark on the end of that sentence.  It takes only few seconds to open sports page on both website to see they are almost identical, that is not so hard to do for most people.

comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on November 07, 2023, 09:51:04 PMRoyse777 can you answer our questions or someone from BitUbet team will do it?He Literarily said something on top of the ANNQuote from: Royse777 on November 07, 2023, 11:18:36 AM..The announcement is designed and managed by BitUbet management. I am only responsible to post the thread...Perhaps you are going to wait until the register their rep account in the forum or just ask them about this using their Live support.

I feel like BitUbet interface is more like Stake.com, the Casino and Sports menu right on the top left.BitUbetRollbit

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: @Royse777, The intention of the validator link you added is probably not workingQuote from: Royse777 on November 07, 2023, 11:18:36 AMThe validator detects the bitcointalk domain name instead of that of the casino, leading to this error. Instead of this Perhaps, you could devise another way on how this should work.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Quote from: salad daging on November 07, 2023, 11:17:34 PMPerhaps the only identical similarity with Rollbit is in terms of its Sportsbook, while the other displays are slightly different.It means both of the casinos use a same sportsbook provider and there's nothing wrong with that since few or more casinos did same.But when I compare the odds in Rollbit and BitUbet, Rollbit has higher odds in options. BitUbet need to offer something interesting if they want to make people to try their sites.Quote from: Kemarit on November 09, 2023, 09:33:50 PMI don't know but maybe it's just me, but I don't see any similarity on my end?Yep, it's not something like copy paste and only change the colors, there's an improvement or modification.
